    Ordinary Skin Care Routine For Acne Prone Skin

    Written by Aayusha on 10 Sep 2020

    The ordinary skincare products have specific skin care routine for acne-prone skin. There treatments offer an effective clinical technologies that help you build amazing skin care routine.

    Skin Care Routines are simple to make and follow. It is a combination of simple steps, cleanse, tone, antioxidant serums, moisturizers, and sunscreen. Ordinary has a huge range of ordinary products with active ingredients that target acne-prone skin.

    Let’s take a dig at Ordinary Skin Care Routine for acne-prone skin.

    Ordinary Skin Care Routine for dry and dehydrated skin for AM

    1. Cleanse
    2. Buffet + Copper Peptides 1%
    3. Toner or Essence
    4. Eye Treatment
    5. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
    6. Niacinamide 10% + Zinc PCA 1%
    7. EUK 134 0.1%
    8. Azelaic Acid Suspension 10%
    9. Mineral UV Filters SPF 30 with Antioxidants
    10. Coveraging Foundation

    Ordinary Skin Care Routine for dry and dehydrated skin for PM

    1. Double Cleanse - Squalene Clenser
    2. Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
    3. Buffet + Copper Peptides 1%
    4. Eye Product
    5. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
    6. 100% Organic Cold Press Rose Hip Seed Oil

    Skin Care routine for acne-prone skin may include a product with Salicylic Acid to spot treat the acne. Removing your makeup is a must along with finding out which product suits you the best.
